pages.text: Iron, Body... both of these Substances contain an aspect of Repression, some manner of Essential Force that prevent the manifestation of Certain Effects. Adding a small amount of Warp proves to permit their Union.

And, lo, what a strange union it is! The resulting Crystal is too fragile to shape into a tool, but when placed into the Crucible, it seems to Inhibit any and all Reactions that would otherwise have taken place!$(p)I shall remind my Assistant to remind Me to continue work researching this...
$(o)Ah... sorry old man, it must have slipped my mind. Maybe I could find some use for these things?
